info.description:
# Overview 

 Information and statistics about FIRST Robotics Competition teams and events. If you are looking for the old version (v2) of the API, documentation can be found [here](/apidocs/v2). 

# Authentication 

All endpoints require an Auth Key to be passed in the header `X-TBA-Auth-Key`. If you do not have an auth key yet, you can obtain one from your [Account Page](/account).
info.title: The Blue Alliance API v3
info.x-version-info: Versions of the API follow the format X.Y.Z, with X being a major version, Y denoting the minor version, and Z the point release. Changes to the spec or API that result in a major version change will significantly impact implementations. Changes to the minor version indicate paths and/or fields in existing models may be added, and any breaking changes will be confined to paths or models listed as in-development in the prior minor version. Changes to the point release indicate no format or structure changes to the paths or models, but updated or clarified documentation. Note that changes to paths and models refer to the actual result from the API, not the documentation.
info.x-changes: 3.0.1 - 3.0.2: `Team_Event_Status` and `Event_Ranking` model documentation changed to reflect actual API return. Changes involved W-L-T and ranking properties. --- 3.0.0 - 3.0.1: Descriptions updated to clarify some terms and improve grammar. The `district` property on the `Event` object now points to the `District_List` model, which was identical. `Required` fields on fully documented models now represent fields that may not be `null`. `District_Ranking` model documented.

tags.name: TBA
tags.description: Calls that expose TBA internals or status.

tags.name: list
tags.description: Calls that return a list of records.

tags.name: team
tags.description: Calls that return team or team-specific information.

tags.description: Calls that return event, or event-specific information.

tags.description: Calls that return match, or match-specific information.

tags.name: district
tags.description: Calls that return district, or district-related information.

apiKey.description: Your TBA v3 API Key can be obtained from your [Account Page](/account) on the TBA website.
apiKey.name: X-TBA-Auth-Key

If-Modified-Since.name: If-Modified-Since
If-Modified-Since.description: Value of the `Last-Modified` header in the most recently cached response by the client.

page_num.name: page_num
page_num.description: Page number of results to return, zero-indexed

year.name: year
year.description: Competition Year (or Season). Must be 4 digits.

Unauthorized.description: Not Authorized - No TBA v3 API Key was provided, or it is not valid.

NotModified.description: Not Modified - Use Local Cached Value

get.description: Returns API status, and TBA status information.

Last-Modified.description: Indicates the date and time the data returned was last updated. Used by clients in the `If-Modified-Since` request header.

Cache-Control.description: The `Cache-Control` header, in particular the `max-age` value, contains the number of seconds the result should be considered valid for. During this time subsequent calls should return from the local cache directly.

Cache-Control.description: The `Cache-Control` header, in particular the `max-age` value, contains the number of seconds the result should be considered valid for. During this time subsequent calls should return from the local cache directly.

/teams/{page_num}/simple.x-comment: Simple (non-full) responses need a separate path definition. See also https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/issues/270

current_season.description: Year of the current FRC season.

max_season.description: Maximum FRC season year for valid queries.

is_datafeed_down.description: True if the entire FMS API provided by FIRST is down.

down_events.description: An array of strings containing event keys of any active events that are no longer updating.

min_app_version.description: Internal use - Minimum application version required to correctly connect and process data.

latest_app_version.description: Internal use - Latest application version available.

key.description: TBA team key with the format `frcXXXX` with `XXXX` representing the team number.

team_number.description: Official team number issued by FIRST.

name.description: Official long name registered with FIRST.

city.description: City of team derived from parsing the address registered with FIRST.

state_prov.description: State of team derived from parsing the address registered with FIRST.

country.description: Country of team derived from parsing the address registered with FIRST.

key.description: TBA team key with the format `frcXXXX` with `XXXX` representing the team number.

team_number.description: Official team number issued by FIRST.

name.description: Official long name registered with FIRST.

city.description: City of team derived from parsing the address registered with FIRST.

state_prov.description: State of team derived from parsing the address registered with FIRST.

country.description: Country of team derived from parsing the address registered with FIRST.

address.description: Will be NULL, for future development.

postal_code.description: Postal code from the team address.

gmaps_place_id.description: Will be NULL, for future development.

gmaps_url.description: Will be NULL, for future development.

lat.description: Will be NULL, for future development.

lng.description: Will be NULL, for future development.

location_name.description: Will be NULL, for future development.

website.description: Official website associated with the team.

rookie_year.description: First year the team officially competed.

motto.description: Team's motto as provided by FIRST.

home_championship.description: Location of the team's home championship each year as a key-value pair. The year (as a string) is the key, and the city is the value.

robot_name.description: Name of the robot as provided by the team.

key.description: Internal TBA identifier for this robot.

team_key.description: TBA team key for this robot.

key.description: TBA event key with the format yyyy[EVENT_CODE], where yyyy is the year, and EVENT_CODE is the event code of the event.

name.description: Official name of event on record either provided by FIRST or organizers of offseason event.

event_code.description: Event short code, as provided by FIRST.

district.description: The district this event is in, may be null.

city.description: City, town, village, etc. the event is located in.

state_prov.description: State or Province the event is located in.

country.description: Country the event is located in.

year.description: Year the event data is for.

key.description: TBA event key with the format yyyy[EVENT_CODE], where yyyy is the year, and EVENT_CODE is the event code of the event.

name.description: Official name of event on record either provided by FIRST or organizers of offseason event.

event_code.description: Event short code, as provided by FIRST.

district.description: The district this event is in, may be null.

city.description: City, town, village, etc. the event is located in.

state_prov.description: State or Province the event is located in.

country.description: Country the event is located in.

year.description: Year the event data is for.

short_name.description: Same as `name` but doesn't include event specifiers, such as 'Regional' or 'District'. May be null.

event_type_string.description: Event Type, eg Regional, District, or Offseason.

week.description: Week of the competition season this event is in.

address.description: Address of the event's venue, if available.

postal_code.description: Postal code from the event address.

gmaps_place_id.description: Google Maps Place ID for the event address.

gmaps_url.description: Link to address location on Google Maps.

location_name.description: Name of the location at the address for the event, eg. Blue Alliance High School.

first_event_id.description: The FIRST internal Event ID, used to link to the event on the FRC webpage.

division_keys.description: An array of event keys for the divisions at this event.

parent_event_key.description: The TBA Event key that represents the event's parent. Used to link back to the event from a division event. It is also the inverse relation of `divison_keys`.

playoff_type.description: Playoff Type, as defined here: https://github.com/the-blue-alliance/the-blue-alliance/blob/master/consts/playoff_type.py#L4, or null.

playoff_type_string.description: String representation of the `playoff_type`, or null.

alliance_status_str.description: An HTML formatted string suitable for display to the user containing the team's alliance pick status.

playoff_status_str.description: An HTML formatter string suitable for display to the user containing the team's playoff status.

overall_status_str.description: An HTML formatted string suitable for display to the user containing the team's overall status summary of the event.

dq.description: Number of matches the team was disqualified for.

qual_average.description: For some years, average qualification score. Can be null.

sort_orders.description: Ordered list of values used to determine the rank. See the `sort_order_info` property for the name of each value.

team_key.description: TBA team key for this rank.

sort_order_info.description: Ordered list of names corresponding to the elements of the `sort_orders` array.

name.description: The descriptive name of the value used to sort the ranking.

precision.description: The number of digits of precision used for this value, eg `2` would correspond to a value of `101.11` while `0` would correspond to `101`.

pick.description: Order the team was picked in the alliance from 0-2, with 0 being alliance captain.

out.description: TBA key for the team replaced by the backup.

in.description: TBA key for the backup team called in.

level.description: The highest playoff level the team reached.

status.description: Current competition status for the playoffs.

playoff_average.description: The average match score during playoffs. Year specific. May be null if not relevant for a given year.

Team_Event_Status_playoff.description: Playoff status for this team, may be null if the team did not make playoffs, or playoffs have not begun.

rankings.description: List of rankings at the event.

matches_played.description: Number of matches played by this team.

qual_average.description: The average match score during qualifications. Year specific. May be null if not relevant for a given year.

rank.description: The team's rank at the event as provided by FIRST.

sort_orders.description: Additional year-specific information, may be null. See parent `sort_order_info` for details.

sort_order_info.description: List of year-specific values provided in the `sort_orders` array for each team.

name.description: Name of the field used in the `sort_order` array.

precision.description: Integer expressing the number of digits of precision in the number provided in `sort_orders`.

points.description: Points gained for each team at the event. Stored as a key-value pair with the team key as the key, and an object describing the points as it's value.

tiebreakers.description: Tiebreaker values for each team at the event. Stored as a key-value pair with the team key as the key, and an object describing the tiebreaker elements as it's value.

Event_Insights_2016.description: Insights for FIRST Stronghold qualification and elimination matches.

LowBar.description: For the Low Bar - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

A_ChevalDeFrise.description: For the Cheval De Frise - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

A_Portcullis.description: For the Portcullis - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

B_Ramparts.description: For the Ramparts - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

B_Moat.description: For the Moat - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

C_SallyPort.description: For the Sally Port - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

C_Drawbridge.description: For the Drawbridge - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

D_RoughTerrain.description: For the Rough Terrain - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

D_RockWall.description: For the Rock Wall - An array with three values, number of times damaged, number of opportunities to damage, and percentage.

average_high_goals.description: Average number of high goals scored.

average_low_goals.description: Average number of low goals scored.

breaches.description: An array with three values, number of times breached, number of opportunities to breech, and percentage.

scales.description: An array with three values, number of times scaled, number of opportunities to scale, and percentage.

challenges.description: An array with three values, number of times challenged, number of opportunities to challenge, and percentage.

captures.description: An array with three values, number of times captured, number of opportunities to capture, and percentage.

high_score.description: An array with three values, high score, match key from the match with the high score, and the name of the match.

Event_Insights_2017.description: Insights for FIRST STEAMWORKS qualification and elimination matches.

average_fuel_points_auto.description: Average fuel points scored during auto.

average_fuel_points_teleop.description: Average fuel points scored during teleop.

average_high_goals.description: Average points scored in the high goal.

average_high_goals_auto.description: Average points scored in the high goal during auto.

average_high_goals_teleop.description: Average points scored in the high goal during teleop.

average_low_goals.description: Average points scored in the low goal.

average_low_goals_auto.description: Average points scored in the low goal during auto.

average_low_goals_teleop.description: Average points scored in the low goal during teleop.

average_mobility_points_auto.description: Average mobility points scored during auto.

average_rotor_points_auto.description: Average rotor points scored during auto.

average_rotor_points_teleop.description: Average rotor points scored during teleop.

average_takeoff_points_teleop.description: Average takeoff points scored during teleop.

high_kpa.description: An array with three values, kPa scored, match key from the match with the high kPa, and the name of the match

high_score.description: An array with three values, high score, match key from the match with the high score, and the name of the match

kpa_achieved.description: An array with three values, number of times kPa bonus achieved, number of opportunities to bonus, and percentage.

mobility_counts.description: An array with three values, number of times mobility bonus achieved, number of opportunities to bonus, and percentage.

rotor_1_engaged.description: An array with three values, number of times rotor 1 engaged, number of opportunities to engage, and percentage.

rotor_1_engaged_auto.description: An array with three values, number of times rotor 1 engaged in auto, number of opportunities to engage in auto, and percentage.

rotor_2_engaged.description: An array with three values, number of times rotor 2 engaged, number of opportunities to engage, and percentage.

rotor_2_engaged_auto.description: An array with three values, number of times rotor 2 engaged in auto, number of opportunities to engage in auto, and percentage.

rotor_3_engaged.description: An array with three values, number of times rotor 3 engaged, number of opportunities to engage, and percentage.

rotor_4_engaged.description: An array with three values, number of times rotor 4 engaged, number of opportunities to engage, and percentage.

takeoff_counts.description: An array with three values, number of times takeoff was counted, number of opportunities to takeoff, and percentage.

Event_OPRs.description: OPR, DPR, and CCWM for teams at the event.

oprs.description: A key-value pair with team key (eg `frc254`) as key and OPR as value.

dprs.description: A key-value pair with team key (eg `frc254`) as key and DPR as value.

ccwms.description: A key-value pair with team key (eg `frc254`) as key and CCWM as value.

Event_Predictions.description: JSON Object containing prediction information for the event. Contains year-specific information and is subject to change.

type.description: Type of webcast, typically descriptive of the streaming provider.

channel.description: Type specific channel information. May be the YouTube stream, or Twitch channel name. In the case of iframe types, contains HTML to embed the stream in an HTML iframe.

file.description: File identification as may be required for some types. May be null.

key.description: TBA event key with the format `yyyy[EVENT_CODE]_[COMP_LEVEL]m[MATCH_NUMBER]`, where `yyyy` is the year, and `EVENT_CODE` is the event code of the event, `COMP_LEVEL` is (qm, ef, qf, sf, f), and `MATCH_NUMBER` is the match number in the competition level. A set number may append the competition level if more than one match in required per set.

comp_level.description: The competition level the match was played at.

set_number.description: The set number in a series of matches where more than one match is required in the match series.

match_number.description: The match number of the match in the competition level.

alliances.description: A list of alliances, the teams on the alliances, and their score.

winning_alliance.description: The color (red/blue) of the winning alliance. Will contain an empty string in the event of no winner, or a tie.

event_key.description: Event key of the event the match was played at.

time.description: UNIX timestamp (seconds since 1-Jan-1970 00:00:00) of the scheduled match time, as taken from the published schedule.

predicted_time.description: UNIX timestamp (seconds since 1-Jan-1970 00:00:00) of the TBA predicted match start time.

actual_time.description: UNIX timestamp (seconds since 1-Jan-1970 00:00:00) of actual match start time.

key.description: TBA event key with the format `yyyy[EVENT_CODE]_[COMP_LEVEL]m[MATCH_NUMBER]`, where `yyyy` is the year, and `EVENT_CODE` is the event code of the event, `COMP_LEVEL` is (qm, ef, qf, sf, f), and `MATCH_NUMBER` is the match number in the competition level. A set number may be appended to the competition level if more than one match in required per set.

comp_level.description: The competition level the match was played at.

set_number.description: The set number in a series of matches where more than one match is required in the match series.

match_number.description: The match number of the match in the competition level.

alliances.description: A list of alliances, the teams on the alliances, and their score.

winning_alliance.description: The color (red/blue) of the winning alliance. Will contain an empty string in the event of no winner, or a tie.

event_key.description: Event key of the event the match was played at.

time.description: UNIX timestamp (seconds since 1-Jan-1970 00:00:00) of the scheduled match time, as taken from the published schedule.

actual_time.description: UNIX timestamp (seconds since 1-Jan-1970 00:00:00) of actual match start time.

predicted_time.description: UNIX timestamp (seconds since 1-Jan-1970 00:00:00) of the TBA predicted match start time.

post_result_time.description: UNIX timestamp (seconds since 1-Jan-1970 00:00:00) when the match result was posted.

score_breakdown.description: Score breakdown for auto, teleop, etc. points. Varies from year to year. May be null.

videos.description: Array of `Media` objects associated with this match.

score.description: Score for this alliance. Will be null or -1 for an unplayed match.

items.description: TBA Team keys (eg `frc254`) for teams on this alliance.

surrogate_team_keys.description: TBA team keys (eg `frc254`) of any teams playing as a surrogate.

items.description: Team key of a surrogate team.

Match_Score_Breakdown_2015.description: See the 2015 FMS API documentation for a description of each value

Match_Score_Breakdown_2016.description: See the 2016 FMS API documentation for a description of each value.

Match_Score_Breakdown_2017.description: See the 2017 FMS API documentation for a description of each value.

Media.description: The `Media` object contains a reference for most any media associated with a team or event on TBA.

type.description: String type of the media element.

foreign_key.description: The key used to identify this media on the media site.

details.description: If required, a JSON dict of additional media information.

preferred.description: True if the media is of high quality.

out.description: Team key that was replaced by the backup team.

in.description: Team key that was called in as the backup.

backup.description: Backup team called in, may be null.

declines.description: List of teams that declined the alliance.

items.description: Team key that declined the alliance.

picks.description: List of team keys picked for the alliance. First pick is captain.

items.description: Team key picked for the alliance.

name.description: The name of the award as provided by FIRST. May vary for the same award type.

event_key.description: The event_key of the event the award was won at.

recipient_list.description: A list of recipients of the award at the event. Either team_key and/or awardee for individual awards.

year.description: The year this award was won.

Award_Recipient.description: An `Award_Recipient` object represents the team and/or person who received an award at an event.

team_key.description: The TBA team key for the team that was given the award. May be null.

awardee.description: The name of the individual given the award. May be null.

abbreviation.description: The short identifier for the district.

display_name.description: The long name for the district.

District_Ranking.description: Rank of a team in a district.

team_key.description: TBA team key for the team.

rank.description: Numerical rank of the team, 1 being top rank.

rookie_bonus.description: Any points added to a team as a result of the rookie bonus.

point_total.description: Total district points for the team.

event_points.description: List of events that contributed to the point total for the team.

event_key.description: TBA Event key for this event.

district_cmp.description: `true` if this event is a District Championship event.

qual_points.description: Points awarded for qualification match performance.

elim_points.description: Points awarded for elimination match performance.

total.description: Total points awarded at this event.

WLT_Record.description: A Win-Loss-Tie record for a team, or an alliance.
